title: Paradise

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Lure a player to you. All players who visit you will be given the option of entering Paradise or not. If they visit you again, they will be forced to enter.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players in Paradise become unlynchable and are healed/purged the night they enter, but gain a downside assigned by you:
> They cannot use night abilities during a full moon.
> They learn your name, and you may control their actions.
> They cannot whisper.
- Players in Paradise cannot leave.
- You may still make night actions when dead. Paradise still remains.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have at least one player with each downside in Paradise.

desc:
Post 2065
*A beautiful, flawless place. Nothing more.*
